toString

public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object[] array)
Converts each element in the array to a string via element.toString() and creates a formated string containing all the strings. Format: 
 
  0 = item0
  1 = item2
  3 = item3
  ...

getClasspath

public static java.lang.String getClasspath()

memoryStatus

public static final SystemUtil.MemoryStatus memoryStatus()
Memory usage for JVM, useful for debugging. Does not call garbage collector before determining memory usage.

Returns:
string containing total and free memory usage for JVM.

memoryStatus

public static final SystemUtil.MemoryStatus memoryStatus(boolean gc)
Memory usage for JVM, useful for debugging.

Parameters:
gc - whether to call System.gc() before determining memory usage.
Returns:
string containing total and free memory usage for JVM.

environmentDump

public static java.lang.String environmentDump()

runtimeResourceLocation

public static java.net.URL runtimeResourceLocation(java.lang.String src)
Attempts to resolve the src to a URL. This is useful for checking where a class or resource file is being loaded from by the classloadeder.
    e.g. src = ...
  • org.ensembl.Example
  • org/ensembl/Example.class
  • com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
Performs some magic to try to resolve the name if necessary, e.g. org.ensembl.Example will resolve to org/ensembl/Example.class

Parameters:
src - src file path or qualified class name.
Returns:
resolved URL or null if none found.
